name: Match Those Body Parts!
description:
Match! Those! Body Parts! is a simple mobile-style match 3 game.

It was created following this tutorial: https://www.raywenderlich.com/673-how-to-make-a-match-3-game-in-unity.

All art assets were drawn by me to make it more science-y and medical. Fonts are taken from the tutorial package. 

Controls

  • Click on any icon to move it one space. 
  • Match three icons with the same image horizontally or vertically to score points. 
  • Score as many points as you can in the time limit! Have fun!
